title: Brand New House
details:
Brand New House for Sale in Thalawathugoda

4 Bedrooms
4 Bathrooms
2,600 Sq Ft
8.2 Perches

Custom Built - Practical Living - Close to Nature & City

Weera Mawatha - Kalalgoda Road

Bathrooms: Rocell & Hansgrohe Fittings
Pantry: Modern fully equipped with Deco cooker hub and hood
Light Fittings: Custom made designer fittings
Ceiling: Natural wooden ceiling
Doors: Treated natural mahogany
Access: 30 ft wide access road
Construction: By renown charted architect and chartered structural engineer

Rs 28 Million
